title: Sound On: Biden NATO Agenda, Putin Meeting
itunes:title: Sound On: Biden NATO Agenda, Putin Meeting
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy. Guests: Rep. Abigail Spanberger, a Democrat representing Virginia's 7th congressional district, Bloomberg tax reporter Laura Davison, and Boyd Matheson, former Chief of Staff for Senator Mike Lee.

Guests: Rep. Abigail Spanberger, a Democrat representing Virginia's 7th congressional district, Bloomberg tax reporter Laura Davison, and Boyd Matheson, former Chief of Staff for Senator Mike Lee.
